Text:
I've been wondering how all these new folks had my studio CD.. My question got answered.. I still owe $7K for this record.. so just know that after all the live bootlegs I've offered up for free, that this torrent being alive in here has kept me from getting out of debt..

I won't ask you to pull it or anything.. Do what yo want.. Just know that I owe money on this record and can't pay my investors if I'm not selling Cd's. -JB
